resources.string: Offer people a seamless experience across the entire portfolio of Microsoft\'s mobile apps. Whether it\'s for a client, partner, or your own customers, design and build custom apps that are natively Android while still uniquely Fluent.

They should be easy to scan for relevant and actionable information. Elements, like text and images, should be placed.
Each card is made up of content blocks. All of the blocks, as a whole, are related to a single subject or destination.
